schema_version.description: Semantic-like version tag, e.g. v1.0 or v1.2.3

study_id.description: Internal opaque ID for this study/article (may be a DOI)

interventions.description: Optional free-text procedural details per arm; link via arm_id.

estimands.description: ICH E9(R1) estimands framework for precise treatment effect definition

tidier_checklist.description: TIDieR (Template for Intervention Description and Replication) checklist for complex interventions

dsmb_dmc.description: Data Safety Monitoring Board / Data Monitoring Committee details

platform_trial_details.description: Details for platform trials with shared control arm

differential_dropout.description: Whether dropout differs significantly between arms

arm_factors.description: Mapping van factor-niveaus naar deze arm (alleen bij factorial-ontwerpen).

adherence_pct.description: % deelnemers die de toegewezen interventie ontvingen

crossovers_to.description: arm_id waarheen deelnemers zijn gecrossoverd (indien relevant)

factor_contrast.description: Voor factorial: welk factorcontrast wordt geanalyseerd.

Estimand.description: ICH E9(R1) estimand framework for precise treatment effect definition

population_level_summary.description: How individual outcomes are summarized (e.g., mean difference, odds ratio)

intercurrent_events.description: Events occurring after treatment initiation that affect interpretation

handling_strategy.description: How this intercurrent event is handled in the estimand

instrument_name.description: Name of PRO instrument (e.g., EQ-5D, SF-36, EORTC QLQ-C30)

domain.description: Domain assessed (e.g., physical functioning, pain, quality of life)

pro_ctcae.description: Whether PRO-CTCAE (Patient-Reported Outcomes version of CTCAE) was used

win_ratio.description: Win ratio analysis for hierarchical composite outcomes
